duties_responsibilities.duty: Estimate and assess earthwork, wet utilities, and concrete construction projects.
Manage associate estimators, ensuring quality, accuracy, and influencing project pursuit decisions.
Foster constructive contract language to mentor and guide future generations in the construction field.
Maintain a focus on meeting customer needs, building effective relationships with stakeholders, and seeking new business opportunities.
Participate in industry, client, and community relations to enhance company image and support operations training programs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering or Construction Management (Master's preferred)
